Rush of Steel.name: Rush of Steel
Rush of Steel.flavor: You attack with a long, looping slash of your heavy weapon, then step forward and reverse your grip to strike another enemy from a different direction.
Rush of Steel.primaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Rush of Steel.effect: You shift 1 square and make a melee secondary attack.
Rush of Steel.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target

Cruel Flourish.name: Cruel Flourish
Cruel Flourish.flavor: Sensing that your enemy is vulnerable, you follow up a successful attack with a quick, devastating strike.
Cruel Flourish.trigger: You hit an enemy with a close or a melee attack
Cruel Flourish.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).

Vanguard Defense.name: Vanguard Defense
Vanguard Defense.flavor: Keeping your mighty weapon in constant motion, you blend parries and threatening sweeps into an active defense.
Vanguard Defense.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC, and at the end of each of your turns while you are conscious, each enemy adjacent to you is marked until the end of your next turn.
